Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at an extraordinary $10000. This product has been meticulously crafted to provide unparalleled benefits and experiences. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. I kindly invite you to consider this opportunity to own something truly special. If you're interested, we can arrange a time to discuss further details and ensure a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
